ValidationRule.description: CellX__c와 CellY__c에 0, 1, 2, 3, 4 외 값 입력 불가
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT( AND( OR(CellX__c = 0, CellX__c = 1, CellX__c = 2, CellX__c = 3, CellX__c = 4), OR(CellY__c = 0, CellY__c = 1, CellY__c = 2, CellY__c = 3, CellY__c = 4)))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: CellX__c와 CellY__c에 0, 1, 2, 3, 4 외 값 입력 불가
